header.value: Are you sure you want to cancel the shoot at {shootingPlace} on {shootingDate}?

reminder24.value: As a reminder, you will be charged for cancellations made within 24 hours of the shoot except when cancelling within 2 hours of ordering. The cancellation fee is {penaltyRatio24}% of the price of the shoot.

reminder48.value: As a reminder, you will be charged for cancellations made within 48 hours of the shoot except when cancelling within 2 hours of ordering. You will be charged a cancellation fee of {penaltyRatio48}% of the price of the shoot for cancellations between 48 hours and 24 hours before the shoot. Within 24 hours of the shoot you will be charged {penaltyRatio24}% of the price of the shoot

reminderCovid.value: If you have chosen 'Covid 19' as your reason for cancellation, your submission will be reviewed. Following internal validation, the fee will not be invoiced. By choosing 'Covid 19' as your reason for cancellation, you certify that the information you provide is true and accurate.

header.value: Are you sure you want to reschedule the shoot at {shootingPlace} on {shootingDate}?

reminderCovid.value: If you have chosen 'Covid 19' as your reason for reschedulement, your submission will be reviewed. Following internal validation, the fee will not be invoiced. By choosing 'Covid 19' as your reason for reschedulement, you certify that the information you provide is true and accurate.

header.value: Are you sure you want to put the shoot scheduled for {shootingPlace} {shootingDate} on hold?

reminder24.value: As a reminder, when you postpone the shoot within 24 hours of the shoot time, you will be charged a deferral fee of {penaltyRatio24}% of the shoot price, except if you postpone within 2 hours from the order time.

reminder48.value: As a reminder, postponements within 48 hours will be charged a deferral fee unless they are within 2 hours of ordering. Between 48-24 hours the deferral fee shall be {penaltyRatio48}% of the shoots price. Within 24 hours the deferral fee shall be {penaltyRatio24}% of the shoots price.
